{"step_by_step_thinking": "An extra cusp on a maxillary central incisor is a dental anomaly known as talon cusp. B. Sturge-Weber Syndrome: Sturge-Weber Syndrome is a rare neurological disorder characterized by a port-wine stain birthmark on the face and abnormalities in the brain and eyes. It is not specifically associated with an extra cusp on a maxillary central incisor.
